医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
母亲高叶酸摄入量对后代健康结果的影响研究人员总结了母亲过量补充叶酸 (FA) 对儿童的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/The-effects-of-high-maternal-folate-intake-on-the-health-outcomes-of-offspring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/The-effects-of-high-maternal-folate-intake-on-the-health-outcomes-of-offspring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00e4d0cd-056c-42ea-bd6e-38ecfcbc8784 Fri, 08 Mar 2024 08:54:00 -0500 The effects of high maternal folate intake on the health outcomes of offspring
赋能变革：Hologic 如何塑造女性医疗保健的未来Hologic, Inc. 是一家全球医疗技术创新公司，主要致力于通过早期检测和治疗来改善女性的健康和福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Empowering-Change-How-Hologic-is-Shaping-the-Future-of-Womens-Healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Empowering-Change-How-Hologic-is-Shaping-the-Future-of-Womens-Healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dee17fcb-ba0b-46be-92d7-8d605b914e7d Fri, 08 Mar 2024 08:52:00 -0500 Empowering Change: How Hologic is Shaping the Future of Women's Healthcare
研究表明，患有自身免疫性疾病的孕妇发生不良妊娠结局的风险更大研究人员分析了对自身免疫性疾病与妊娠结局之间的关联进行的系统评价。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Pregnant-women-with-autoimmune-conditions-at-a-greater-risk-of-developmenting-adverse-pregnancy-outcomes-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Pregnant-women-with-autoimmune-conditions-at-a-greater-risk-of-developmenting-adverse-pregnancy-outcomes-study-suggests.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4e20605-9a27-4f7b-b922-4f120b3ef0a8 Fri, 08 Mar 2024 08:20:00 -0500 Pregnant women with autoimmune conditions at a greater risk of developing adverse pregnancy outcomes, study suggests
类风湿关节炎患者的特定人群患抑郁症的风险是否较高？研究人员评估了诊断出类风湿性关节炎（RA）后患抑郁症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Is-there-a-higher-risk-of-depression-among-special-populations-of-病人-with-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Is-there-a-higher-risk-of-depression-among-special-populations-of-病人-with-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fc2449c-7831-489e-a47b-7f6570ca199d Fri, 08 Mar 2024 07:42:00 -0500 Is there a higher risk of depression among specific populations of patients with rheumatoid arthritis?
维生素 B12 和维生素 D 等营养素可能会增加多种疾病的风险在最近发表在 BMC Public Health 上的一项研究中，研究人员探讨了营养摄入与多种疾病之间的潜在关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Nutrients-like-vitamin-B12-and-vitamin-D-pottially-play-a-role-in-risk-of-multimorbidity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Nutrients-like-vitamin-B12-and-vitamin-D-pottially-play-a-role-in-risk-of-multimorbidity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81241edd-1eff-43c0-9540-44525781471a Fri, 08 Mar 2024 07:08:00 -0500 Nutrients like vitamin B12 and vitamin D potentially play a role in risk of multimorbidity
糖尿病药物度拉鲁肽可减轻抑郁症状当前的研究使用 CMS 抑郁模型强调了度拉鲁肽的抗抑郁作用。值得注意的是，本研究阐明了度拉鲁肽抗抑郁作用背后的潜在代谢。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Diabetes-drug-dulaglutide-may-reduce-symptoms-of-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Diabetes-drug-dulaglutide-may-reduce-symptoms-of-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42cfa752-c3c1-48d7-b681-3ca72ad8a6aa Fri, 08 Mar 2024 06:03:00 -0500 Diabetes drug dulaglutide may reduce symptoms of depression
八种进步之声：AZoNetwork #InspireInclusion 纪念 2024 年国际妇女节每年 3 月 8 日，国际妇女节 (IWD) 都会成为全球女性所取得的巨大成就的焦点。 2024 年，主题#InspireInclusion 邀请我们拥抱多样性并倡导女性融入生活的各个领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Eight-voices-of-progress-AZoNetwork-InspireInclusion-for-International-Womens-Day-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240308/Eight-voices-of-progress-AZoNetwork-InspireInclusion-for-International-Womens-Day-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca9a2c1e-6000-4b53-8728-b262830a1859 Fri, 08 Mar 2024 00:48:00 -0500 Eight voices of progress: AZoNetwork #InspireInclusion for International Women's Day 2024
肠道微生物组对色氨酸的消化会刺激关节炎炎症科罗拉多大学医学系的一名教员表示，她和她的同事们已经发现了消化系统中的细菌可以将饮食中的色氨酸分解成一种炎症化学物质的方法，从而使免疫系统做好关节炎的准备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Tryptophan-digestion-by-gut-microbiome-spurs-arthritis-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Tryptophan-digestion-by-gut-microbiome-spurs-arthritis-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0ebc8c3-51e9-47fa-9835-21fbe2c7d87e Thu, 07 Mar 2024 23:39:04 -0500 Tryptophan digestion by gut microbiome spurs arthritis inflammation
癫痫儿童的新心理治疗可减少心理健康问题一项新的研究发现，由伦敦大学学院领导的科学家团队开发的一种针对癫痫儿童的新心理治疗方法，与标准治疗相比，已被证明可以减少心理健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/New-psychological-treatment-for-epileptic-children-lowers-mental-health-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/New-psychological-treatment-for-epileptic-children-lowers-mental-health-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebf8a469-321d-43ed-952e-ab2f1fa0fb3b Thu, 07 Mar 2024 23:30:00 -0500 New psychological treatment for epileptic children lowers mental health problems
童年“懒惰眼”与成年后健康风险增加有关伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，童年时期患有弱视（“懒惰眼”）的成年人在成年后更有可能患高血压、肥胖和代谢综合征，并且心脏病发作的风险也会增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Childhood-lazy-eye-linked-to-increased-health-risks-in-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Childhood-lazy-eye-linked-to-increased-health-risks-in-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54b15c9b-3595-4f6d-bce9-435e7f0c0c11 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 23:09:33 -0500 Childhood 'lazy eye' linked to increased health risks in adulthood
